sentence.Network_en: Bears are very inquisitive and must be kept mentally stimulated.

sentence.Network_en: Don't be so inquisitive. It's none of your business!
sentence.Network_cn: 别这么追根问底的。这与你无关！

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French inquisitif, -ive, from late Latin inquisitivus, from the verb inquirere (see enquire)

entry.tran: 爱打听的;好探问的;过于好奇的
entry.def: An inquisitive person likes finding out about things, especially secret things.
